body:
If we're going to set this by default, axe all the places we pass this in explicitly?

```
tools/build_pytorch_libs.bat
204:                  -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=1 ^

tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh
200:                   -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=1 ${CMAKE_ARGS[@]}
304:                   -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=1 \

third_party/onnx/setup.py
157:                '-DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON',

third_party/onnx-tensorrt/third_party/onnx/setup.py
156:                '-DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON',
```
body_html:
If we're going to set this by default, axe all the places we pass this in explicitly?

tools/build_pytorch_libs.bat
204:                  -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=1 ^

tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh
200:                   -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=1 ${CMAKE_ARGS[@]}
304:                   -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=1 \

third_party/onnx/setup.py
157:                '-DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON',

third_party/onnx-tensorrt/third_party/onnx/setup.py
156:                '-DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON',
body_text:
If we're going to set this by default, axe all the places we pass this in explicitly?
tools/build_pytorch_libs.bat
204:                  -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=1 ^

tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh
200:                   -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=1 ${CMAKE_ARGS[@]}
304:                   -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=1 \

third_party/onnx/setup.py
157:                '-DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON',

156:                '-DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON',
